perfume.title: FLORIS Perfume E-commerce Platform
perfume.description: Collaborated with team members to complete a perfume e-commerce platform, familiarizing with backend framework application, model design, API development, and frontend data transmission.

responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
responsibilities.item1: Database design and SQL query optimization
responsibilities.item2: Product list and detail page development
responsibilities.item3: Shopping cart implementation and member center design

django.title: RuDjango Tech Blog Platform
django.description: Independently developed and deployed full-stack blog system using modern Python web framework and cloud containerized deployment architecture. The project covers complete CRUD operations, user authentication and authorization, real-time communication, security management and other enterprise-level functions, achieving a complete DevOps process from development to production environment.

features.title: Core Features
features.item1: Complete CRUD operations and RESTful API design
features.item2: User authentication and permission management system
features.item4: IP security control and login anomaly detection

highlights.item1: Django ORM complex query optimization (select_related, prefetch_related)
highlights.item2: Custom Middleware for IP filtering and request interception
highlights.item3: WebSocket long connection for real-time bidirectional communication
